author: xtqqczze
body:
cc: @iSazonov 

* Fix #15625
* Enable [CA2243: Attribute string literals should parse correctly](https://docs.microsoft.com/dotnet/fundamentals/code-analysis/quality-rules/ca2243)

comments.author: sdwheeler
comments.body:
The cmdlet and HelpURI need to be added to the appropriate CSV file in test\powershell\engine\Help\assets\HelpURI.

There are CSV files:
- V2Cmdlets.csv
- V3Cmdlets.csv

I don't know the difference between them, but my guess is that it goes in the V2 file.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> The cmdlet and HelpURI need to be added to the appropriate CSV file in test\powershell\engine\Help\assets\HelpURI.
> 
> There are CSV files:
> 
> * V2Cmdlets.csv
> * V3Cmdlets.csv
> 
> I don't know the difference between them, but my guess is that it goes in the V2 file.

@adityapatwardhan Do you know which CSV file the HelpUri should be added to?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: @xtqqczze Please add to V2 file since it is V2 cmdlet.

comments.author: xtqqczze
comments.body:
> @xtqqczze Please add to V2 file since it is V2 cmdlet.

Added in 6d147e5.

comments.body:

comments.author: adityapatwardhan
comments.body: I think this does not meet the bar backport, but i wanted to have discussion as the issue for this PR was marked backport to 7.1.x

title: Fix CA2243: Attribute string literals should parse correctly
